title: Increases certain penalties for violating the prohibition of animal fighting and for aggravated cruelty to animals
summary: Increases certain penalties for violating the prohibition of animal fighting and for aggravated cruelty to animals and requires a psychiatric evaluation for defendants convicted of aggravated cruelty to animals.
